description: A former employee member of Easter. In order to find the Embryo, he joined Seiyo Elementary and became in charge of Amu`s class in the disguise of a ditzy but kind-hearted teacher. His childhood dream was to become a robot engineer, but when his mentor quit, due to his ailing wife, and his parents opposed the idea, he lost sight of his dream and became a twisted person. He recovered with help from Amu and Su. He resigned from Easter Company and officially become the teacher in charge of Amu`s class.
name: Nikaidou Yuu
